'''Ask Mojang''',<ref name=:0/> also referred to as '''Ask Mojang Home Edition''',<ref>{{ytl|eYw3U8C_P40|Ask Mojang Home Edition #1: Shulker origin reveal!|Minecraft|April 25, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|gEcLKQ44Fds|Ask Mojang Home Edition #2: Snack Attack|Minecraft|May 2, 2020}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|gj5csQJ6Tz8|Ask Mojang Home Edition #3: Extra Levels?!|Minecraft|May 9, 2020}}</ref> '''Ask Mojang Midsummer''',<ref>{{ytl|v3TXUTLClb0|Ask Mojang Midsummer Special with Jeb|Minecraft|June 18, 2020}}</ref> and '''Ask Mojang Anything'''<ref>{{mcnet|ask-mojang-anything--ama---minecraft-live-2022|Ask Mojang Anything (AMA): Minecraft Live 2022|October 27, 2022|Michelle A.}}</ref> is a video series on the [[Minecraft]] YouTube channel, where [[Mojang Studios|Mojang]] employees answer any questions asked by ''Minecraft'' players, mostly on {{w|Twitter}} and {{w|YouTube}} posts that use the hashtag "#askmojang".<ref name=:0/>

Created in July 2, 2019, the [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZHdY_46KnYvhiUi_0VtfqkerwSZbog1a series' playlist] currently counts with 28 videos.
